title: Enhancing AI Practical Competencies: Hybrid Recursive Models for Strengthening Business Writing Skills

context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze structural requirements of business documents and apply standard templates with 80% accuracy.
Learners can selectively utilize three or more rhetorical patterns tailored to work scenarios.
Learners experience a recursive writing process, revising and refining project deliverables at least twice based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
